channel.title: Need help someone pls!
channel.description:
Hi, problem is that , when people in my server x log then they got rollback.. or when i x log then they everyone got roll-backed :S PLS HELP????? --------------------------------------
Need help on adding manta ray fishing spot also... !!

item.title: Need help someone pls!
item.dc:creator: @raunkz raunkz
item.description:
@raunkz wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:9, topic:472457”][quote author=Host Gushers link=topic=590236.msg4179177#msg4179177 date=1355329618]
No one will spoonfeed you…You have to just do what we say and try to fix it…If we spoonfeed you wont learn anything.
[/quote]
I love how you need to say that in EVERY post when you try to help.

True , but i already tried and no results:S

When a player X logs, the server doesn’t understand that they did. Because they only disconnected, they didn’t click the log-out button, that causes your server to save the game.[/quote]
My server save ppls only when they log out… and in , but not in every klick or etc… i need help to add it -.-

Read full topic

item.title: Need help someone pls!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Host Gushers:

No one will spoonfeed you…You have to just do what we say and try to fix it…If we spoonfeed you wont learn anything.

I love how you need to say that in EVERY post when you try to help.

raunkz:

True , but i already tried and no results:S

When a player X logs, the server doesn’t understand that they did. Because they only disconnected, they didn’t click the log-out button, that causes your server to save the game.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help someone pls!
item.dc:creator: @raunkz raunkz
item.description:
@raunkz wrote:

[quote=“Host Gushers, post:5, topic:472457”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=590236.msg4178573#msg4178573 date=1355261958]

Because their character isn’t being saved properly.

You can use any fishing spot for manta I guess, you’ll have to alter your fishing code so that mantas can actually be obtained though.

lol pls in english:D

http://google.com/translate
Translate from your language to English and/or from English to your language.
[/quote]

LOLLOLLLLOLLOL

Check your save method in player.java or playerassistant.java…Basically look in all the player files and check the logout method.

Also i dont really know anything about the fishing thingy sorry.[/quote]
Hi , m8 come to tv because i got player.java playersave.java save.java mutch things no idea what is right one:D

Read full topic
